I have moved to Arizona State University. Please visit me there

My research interests lie in the broad area of Software for Embedded Systems with a particular focus on the processor architecture - compiler boundary.
I have developed a software toolkit for automatic Compiler-in-the-Loop exploration of Embedded Systems.
My other interests are in CAD algorithms and high-level synthesis.
